description: In this video series of twenty lessons, you will learn the Korean alphabet, known as Hangul. We will teach you Hangul using simple steps, showing you the correct stroke order, helpful tricks for memorization, and proper usage in common Korean words. If you want to get started reading and writing Korean, this is THE place to start. You'll learn Korean in mere minutes with these video lessons, so join us for Hana Hana Hangul from KoreanClass101.com!
title: Learn Korean Writing - Hana Hana Hangul
